body_html: Sorry, it appears we got ahead of ourselves with that deprecation. It's not clear the new combiner is superior, and changing it does cause a lot of trouble for people with existing models. @ispirmustafa, this is fallout from 31439963. We should remove the deprecation notice.
body_text: Sorry, it appears we got ahead of ourselves with that deprecation. It's not clear the new combiner is superior, and changing it does cause a lot of trouble for people with existing models. @ispirmustafa, this is fallout from 31439963. We should remove the deprecation notice.
body: Sorry, it appears we got ahead of ourselves with that deprecation. It's not clear the new combiner is superior, and changing it does cause a lot of trouble for people with existing models. @ispirmustafa, this is fallout from 31439963. We should remove the deprecation notice.
